text:
I am using the associations api to get the most recent meeting bookings for a contact like so
```<https://api.hubapi.com/crm-associations/v1/associations/1234/HubSpot_DEFINED/9>?```
is there any way to ensure this returns the most recent ones? I currently have an issue that if there are more than 10 i cant get the most recent one.
I know i can increase the limit to 100 but I just need the latest engagement.
Thanks
Hi Dennis
I'm looking for when i create a company or contact in orderwise, it goes directly to HubSpot for be in the 2 programms, and else
Hi,
i am trying to use this API - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/conversation/visitor-identification> but I am getting thrown out by CORS Policy error. I tried CORS proxy too but in vain
Does anyone has a example implementation of it?
My webpage and code are hosted from the same domain
<@U01E9NT88DD> since the call to actually verify the user requires authentication, it must be made from a backend server.

<@UFBNA9K9A>, My test web page is here,  <https://cdn.marketlinc.com/teamviewer/teamviewer-demo.html>
My code is hosted from <https://cdn.marketlinc.com/teamviewer/teamviewer_demo_callback.js>
right now the code is commented
What is meant by backend?
In this case
In this case it means code executed by a server, not a browser
what change should I make you
I did this
I have to use JS
no option
could you suggest changes here
First thing, please remove the apikey from the message
anyone can grab that and access your entire account from here
You should also rotate the key in your account
Second, it has nothing to do with the code itself but where it’s running. You need a server to run this code on. You can do this with Node.js server if you want to continue using Javascript
Ok, Thanks will change it immediately, I didn't think of apikey going IN here
:neutral_face:

Hi Everyone, I was just wondering if anyone knew of the best way to setup an automated complete backups/rollbacks of the HubSpot account (DB/Content, everything) via the API? is <http://segment.com|segment.com> the best option? - <https://segment.com/sources/HubSpot/> or does it not have all the endpoints?

But still in early discovery, so keen to hear any recommendations
Yeah, either custom code it, or use one of the vendors, or talk to the existing vendors for help to extend to Deals

You can check HubSpot marketplace, whatever OrderWise offers, search engine (I see nothing), PieSync, Zapier, IFTTT, etc. but you will probably have to code up your own integration or use HubSpot Workflows somehow

POST
/crm/v3/associations/{fromObjectType}/{toObjectType}/batch/read
Then find the Assoc with the highest ID number
Security reasons; deliberately impossible
Epic Security Fail; you're going to want to invalidate that API key now.
The whole Internet would be able to pwn your account by reading that JS file, be careful!
<https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/6674607/marketplace/apps/marketing/data-management>

I have one I need pretty badly... how can I scrape KPIs / outcomes / statistics from a HubSpot Report / Dashboard, automatically, to update the company more broadly on how we are performing, even if they do not get direct HubSpot accounts due to security / compliance regulations? There are Analytics APIs for CMS type of stuff but there is nothing for the Sales Reporting.
